isCollidingCheap(Shape, Shape) - Method in class Spacetime
Does a cheap inaccurate check to see if the two specified Shapes are intersecting by checking if the rectangle bounds of the two specified Shapes are intersecting.
isCollidingLessCheap(Shape, Shape) - Method in class Spacetime
Does a somewhat cheap inaccurate test to see if the two specified Shapes are intersecting by checking if the bounding rectangle of the smaller shape is intersecting with the larger shape.
